input_email_body:
Subject: System Crash During Presentation

During a presentation, my system crashed. The probable reason is incompatible software updates You can reach me at carlosm@gmail.com.. I've already attempted to restart the system and verify updates, but the problem still exists. I would greatly appreciate your assistance in resolving this issue promptly to avoid future disruptions. My name is Carlos Mendoza.
